title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: Label font size doesn't change right away it is modified.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Modify the font size of a label.
2. Observe the height of the label.
OB: When the font size of a label is modified, the height of the label does not change.
EB: The label height should adjust accordingly when the font size is modified. The text inside the label should be displayed without being cut off or clipped.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Modify the font size of a label in the user interface.
4. Observe the height of the label to confirm that it adjusts properly with the font size.
